Dear Graydon:
I have your note of January 12 th, and I have been seeing
copies of the material from Dallas Smythe and from Skornia.
I think both of them have given you enough material to
sink a ship.
I would be happy to learn of the reactions after you release
your big guns.
With all best wishes, believe me
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
